competitors.name: Carbon Black
competitors.notes: Next-gen endpoint security with EDR focus

context: In 2015, SentinelOne was an early-stage endpoint security startup (founded 2013) raising Series A/B funding. Traditional antivirus vendors Symantec and McAfee dominated the market. Next-generation endpoint protection was emerging with CrowdStrike, Carbon Black, and Cylance using AI/ML and behavioral analysis. The endpoint detection and response (EDR) category was being defined. SentinelOne differentiated with autonomous AI-driven endpoint protection.
